body.p: This is an XML namespace defined in the XML Events specification. The XML Events Recommendation was published on 14 October 2003.
Note. This namespace name will not be reused for any other purpose. For updated information, please refer to the latest version of the XML Events specification.
For more information about XML, please refer to The Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 specification. For more information about XML namespaces, please refer to the Namespaces in XML specification.
